name: Serena (itch) (Kwago Games)
description:
#TeamSeas, let's go! Support Mr. Beast! (but I'm not sure if he accepts Philippine Peso since I live in the Philippines...)

I've noticed that most of the games on the jam were just "pick up trash in a boat" or "control a fish and destroy trash" and stuff like that, so I tried to be unique this time by making an original story (^^

It was also refreshing to make a game that doesn't use pixel art, since I wanted it to be more detailed (hopefully it worked). I'd consider it a milestone too in my game development history (although it works too much like Touhou/Len'en... and next time I won't use Godot for a bullet hell game like this since I need more control)!

Thanks to PolyMars for the jam, and enjoy the game!

(THERE ARE BACKGROUND AND PERFORMANCE ISSUES ON THE WEB VERSION, PLEASE TRY TO DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS VERSION IF YOU CAN!)
